name: CS50 Development Environment
postStartCommand: pip install --upgrade pip SQLAlchemy cs50 check50 submit50 style50 pytest black && apt-get update && apt-get install -y build-essential gcc gdb make valgrind && sh -c 'cd /tmp && git clone https://github.com/cs50/libcs50.git && cd libcs50 && make install && rm -rf /tmp/libcs50'
